name: Benjamin
description:
"Benjamin" is an experimental interactive experience made in the form of Vignettes. The current build is a vignette where you have just picked up a Boxer that was injured on the road with the name plate "Benjamin." 

Throughout the experience, your job would be to calm this dog by stroking its back while watching the news on the TV. 

Design, art and engineering by Ivan Tsang - Website - Twitter

Sounds from Soundsnap.org
